title: New wifi repeater + ethernet cable makes my league disconnect every 20 seconds
body:
Hey so I was just wondering if someone had this issue or can help me, while I'm writing this I'm trying the hexteck troubleshooting device but it doesnt seem to work. Basicaly my problem is the following: Since I plugged a wifi repeater or whatever its called to my plug next to my pc. Then my pc gets plugged to the repeater and a ethernet cable to my ethernet port. (obviously..) Only problem is league stoppes working. At least it disconnects me from the internet or the server. And what I mean with only is that every other game, like rocket league, counter strike etc.. they work fine I have 30 ping during the entire game. But with League when I connect, in the menu my chat and my game gets disconnected at random. Usually every 20-30 seconds. But my ethernet cable is still plugged in fine. Only league disconnects me from the server or from internet generally.. So I was wondering if its due to my firewall ? Which was fine until now I guess. Or due to something else.. 
I will try to turn off and on my firewall or whatever and repatch the game. 
Last resort is uninstalling and reinstalling the game I guess.
Thanks a lot.
ZeeQa {{champion:238}}

replies.body: It could very possibly be happening from some awkward firewall settings. Let's make sure to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well, just in case you need to update a few things there too. Test those changes in a custom game and let me know if nothing seems to help.
